name: n8n-nodes-palatine
description: Custom n8n node for Palatine Speech API: transcription, diarization, sentiment analysis, summarization
author: Denis

scripts.copy:assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('nodes','PalatineNode','logo.svg');const dstDir=path.join('dist','nodes','PalatineNode');const dst=path.join(dstDir,'logo.svg');if(!fs.existsSync(src)){console.error('ERROR: logo.svg not found at',src);process.exit(1);}fs.mkdirSync(dstDir,{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(src,dst);console.log('OK: copied',src,'->',dst);"
